trigger.description: Perform a quick health check of the agent system

workflow.name: Quick Health Check
workflow.description: Fast assessment of system health and performance

agents.task: Assess current system health, agent success rates, and identify any immediate issues
agents.purpose: Quick health check and performance assessment
agents.expected_output: System health summary and any urgent issues

agents.task: Review health assessment and recommend any immediate actions if critical issues found
agents.purpose: Address any critical issues discovered in health check
agents.expected_output: Immediate action recommendations or all-clear status
